rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with decorative Art Deco elements.
Large living room featuring bold geometric patterns and vibrant Art Deco detailing.
Open dining space with integrated lighting and decorative accents reflecting Art Deco style.
Modern kitchen designed with a fusion of traditional and modern elements, adhering to Indian building norms.
Compact utility area for cleaning and storage, positioned conveniently near the kitchen.
Master bedroom with a spacious balcony emphasizing Art Deco style and Vastu aligned placement.
Second bedroom with its own spacious balcony, designed for joint family members.
Third bedroom with a balcony offering panoramic views of the garden.
Fourth bedroom with a balcony designed to integrate modern Art Deco aesthetics.
Dedicated library space with custom built-ins and decorative lighting to suit the Art Deco style.

openings.description: Main entrance door on the north side, designed with elegant Art Deco detailing.
Large windows providing ample light and air circulation on the east side.
Balcony opening for bedroom 1 with a railing design in line with Vastu principles.
Balcony opening for bedroom 2 offering a view of the garden, adhering to Art Deco aesthetics.
Balcony opening for bedroom 3, ensuring proper sunlight and ventilation.
Balcony opening for bedroom 4 with integrated privacy screens and decorative ironwork.
